!You must pass individual tests to obtain marks. The *Mark of the Pilgrim* is only given to those who pass the Trial of the Pilgrim. You must be above *level 35* to take the test. And to take the Trial of the Pilgrim, visit *Hermit Santiago in the Estate of Gludio*. He lives at a farm with Peter. The *Mark of Glory* is only given to those who pass the Testimony of Glory. You must be above *level 37* to take the test. To take the Testimony of Glory, visit *Prefect Vokian of Giran Castle Town*. And finally, the *Mark of the Lord* is only given to those who pass the Test of the Lord. You must be above *level 39* to take the test. To take the Test of the Lord, visit *Flame Lord Kakai of the Orc Village*. [npc_%objectId%_Link villagemaster/30513/11.htm|Return]Â
